text: @sya_nkabinde COVID19 is the decomposition of lung tissues. Lung tissue decomposition may be  caused by too much exposure in high radiation radio frequencies. May we need to explain what is corona first. I'm not saying 5G cos COVID19 but do a research and connect the dots,simple.
